mapper.insert: insert into system_parameter (param_type, param_name, param_key, param_value, status, create_time, creator, last_update_time, updater) values (#{paramType}, #{paramName}, #{paramKey}, #{paramValue}, #{status}, #{createTime}, #{creator}, #{lastUpdateTime}, #{updater})
mapper.select: select id, param_type, param_name, param_key, param_value, status, create_time, creator, last_update_time, updater from system_parameter where id = #{id}

select id, param_type, param_name, param_key, param_value, status, create_time, creator, last_update_time, updater from system_parameter where param_type = #{paramType} and status = #{status} order by create_time

select id, param_type, param_name, param_key, param_value, status, create_time, creator, last_update_time, updater from system_parameter where param_type = #{paramType} and param_key = #{paramKey} order by create_time LIMIT 1
select count(1) from system_parameter where param_type = #{paramType}
